question: Match the following with their pKa values
Acid pKa
(I) Phenol (a) 16
(II) p-Nitrophenol  (b) 0.78
(III) Ethyl alcohol  (c) 10
(IV) Picric acid  (d) 7.1
images/0fe2621b-e041-43c2-9a0d-1a4e46fb1851.png
options: I – c, II – d, III – a, IV – b
I – a, II – d, III – c, IV – b
I – a, II – b, III – c, IV – d
I – b, II – a, III – d, IV – c
